name: Hyundai Kona Electric
description: The price of Hyundai Kona Electric, a SUV, ranges from Rs. 23.84  - 24.03 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants. Kona Electric has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai Kona Electric has a ground clearance of 172 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 452 Km for Kona Electric.

variants.variant_name: Kona Electric Premium 39.2 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 452 Km
Kona Electric Premium Dual Tone 39.2 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 452 Km
